people.fullDescription: Design tools that make life feel lighter. Health, mental wellbeing, accessibility, study helpers, budgeting, habit tracking, and community support. This is where you build things that actually help the people around you.

planet.fullDescription: Protect the world outside the skyline. Climate dashboards, energy monitors, smart agriculture, waste reduction, air quality tools, and anything that lets communities live more sustainably and respond to change.

culture.fullDescription: Where vibes and code collide. Games, AR or VR experiences, streaming tools, creator platforms, social apps, and anything that lets people express themselves, share stories, and play.

autonomy.fullDescription: Bring the Tech City Verse into physical space. Robotics, drones, wearables, smart home devices, sensor networks, and fleets of agents that respond to the world around them in real time.

commerce.fullDescription: Money, markets, and value flows. Payments, budgeting, investing, campus marketplaces, creator monetization, fraud detection, and tools that help people and small businesses move money smarter.
